newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Bank Indonesia supplies 226 bln rph temporarily.
newsitem.headline: Bank Indonesia supplies 226 bln rph temporarily.

text.p: Indonesia's central bank, Bank Indonesia, supplied some 226 billion rupiah temporarily on the money market early on Wednesday, money traders said.

Some 350 billion rupiah of central bank certificates (SBIs) were due today, compared with 104 billion rupiah of maturing short-term papers (SBPUs) and 20 billion rupiah of weekly SBIs to be settled today.
